CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 28, 1957, pg. A1, reads: "New Tipstaff - Shortly after he was sworn in as a tipstaff in Allegheny County Court, Curtis B. Haines, his wife, Gladys, and Judge Louis K. Kaufman exchanged pleasantries. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Judge Louis L. Kaufman shaking hands with Gladys Haines wearing leaf and stem shaped hat, with Curtis B. Haines standing between them, after his swearing in as Allegheny County Court tipstaff, posed in courtroom
